alert.note: Alert for Fall River; Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 2:52PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Oglala Lakota and southeastern Fall River Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 252 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout 8 miles southwest of Prairie Winds Casino, or 18 miles north of Chadron, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph, and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Oglala Lakota and southeastern Fall River Counties, southeast of Oelrichs. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
